title: Tots' Plots | National Trust
text: Tots' Plots Join us for our free weekly drop-in gardening club for toddlers, packed full of activities whatever the weather. - Booking not needed - Free event No need to book in advance, just turn up to enjoy our free weekly gardening session in the Community Kitchen Garden. Each session is packed full of gardening, crafting and relaxing activities as well as plenty of nature-based stories to enjoy. Everything happens outside in the Community Kitchen Garden, so dress appropriately for the weather and be ready to get very muddy! Times The basics - Suitability Suitable for pre-school age children - Meeting point Please meet at the Community Kitchen Garden next to the Car Park - What to bring and wear Please dress appropriately. The event will go ahead whatever the weather! - Other This is a free drop-in session and booking is not required. Admission is not included. Contact info Seaton Delaval Hall Upcoming events [Delaval Discoveries: Potted History Talk ](/visit/north-east/seaton-delaval-hall/events/0a1973bd-d84a-4d3d-9fa6-ad5346bbcacf) Join our expert guides daily for an introduction to the gay Delavals, the most notorious of Georgian partygoers and pranksters and discover the story behind Sir John Vanbrugh's 300 year old masterpiece. [Harry Baker: Wonderful **SORRY, SOLD OUT** ](/visit/north-east/seaton-delaval-hall/events/a8efda35-7d68-4f2d-a5ee-221b6eb0c857) After a sellout Edinburgh Fringe Run and subsequent 40-date UK Tour, World Poetry Slam Champion Harry Baker joins us in the wonderful setting of the Saloon with a brand new show celebrating the wonder that is being alive. **SOLD OUT** [Pop-Up Family Pride ](/visit/north-east/seaton-delaval-hall/events/a262c9f7-5bcf-4b6c-a633-9e56e4de5a7b) Building on the success of 2023’s Mini Pride, join Curious Arts at Seaton Delaval Hall for a colourful Pop-Up Family Pride. Take part in fun, creative activities from arts and crafts to an inclusive story time with Curious artists. [Summer of Play ](/visit/north-east/seaton-delaval-hall/events/01a729bf-5ba0-45b2-822d-6e9d7b7c264e) There’s lots of fun to be had this summer at Seaton Delaval Hall. From Saturday 20 July to Sunday 1 September, join us for a host of activities inspired by the Delavals’ love of fun, theatricality and mischief.
